code:
%% 4. Recovery Workflow Diagram
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Normal_Operation
    Normal_Operation --> Incident_Detected: System Alert
    Incident_Detected --> Assessment: Trigger DR
    Assessment --> Minor_Recovery: Level 1
    Assessment --> Major_Recovery: Level 2
    Assessment --> Disaster_Recovery: Level 3
    Minor_Recovery --> Service_Restoration
    Major_Recovery --> Service_Restoration
    Disaster_Recovery --> Service_Restoration
    Service_Restoration --> Normal_Operation
    Service_Restoration --> Post_Incident_Review
    Post_Incident_Review --> [*]
